cs213.photoAlbum.control

Class AlbumControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.control.AlbumControl

  • public final class AlbumControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to create, delete, analyze, and manipulate Album objects This class will likely be split into two classes - one to process data, and one to print data to console to facilitate GUI implementation later on.
    Author:
    Ben Green

      Returns timestamp of the photo in the album with the latest timestamp

      Returns timestamp of the photo in the album with the earliest timestamp

      Parses specified user's albums and displays information about each one

      Lists all photos in specified album for specified user
